name: Security Guy
description:
WEEK 5 OF MY GAME A WEEK!

I didn't upload last week's game because I really hated it, this week's game is better though!! 

This game is all about multitasking and reflexes. The theme this week was camerawork so I made a game where you play as a prison officer that monitors the security cameras. Keep an eye on all 3 prisoners to make sure they don't escape, but remember, you have paperwork to get done! Make sure you're getting you're work done and making sure the prisoners stay put in this stressful fast-paced game!
